data.title: Experts we’ve interviewed for book recommendations, listed by discipline
data.meta_description: If you're looking for expert book recommendations, arranged by topic, you can find all the experts we've asked for recommendations and interviewed below.
data.text:
“An expert is a person who has made all the mistakes which can be made in a very narrow field.” —Niels Bohr

Five Books has been interviewing experts about the best books in their fields of expertise since 2009. Below you can find all the experts we’ve interviewed, listed by profession.

In case you’re new to Five Books, the format is: an expert, a topic and the five best books on that topic, explained in an interview. Tip: you’ll normally learn quite a lot about the topic from our interviews, even if you don’t get around to reading all the books.
